task: show me all machines.  use --json to avoid parsing errors. Make sure I have human friendly markdown block with complete command

steps.input: Find information relevant to this task: show me all machines.  use --json to avoid parsing errors. Make sure I have human friendly markdown block with complete command . Return only the most relevant information from the Lacework CLI documentation.
steps.output:
To show all machines using the Lacework CLI and output the results in JSON format, you can use the following command:

```bash
lacework api post /api/v2/Entities/Machines/search -d "{}" --json
```

This command requests a JSON response of all machines within the given time window.
